Rate your overall experience of the confluence
1. How was the general conduct and organization of the lecture?
2. Did you have an overview of the sponsor’s activities?
3. Rate the lecture under the following heads:
i) Clarity of ideas and informativeness
ii) Duration
4. Did the lecture keep you engaged?
5. Overall event experience
1. How would you rate your interaction with Shaastra coordinator?
2. How would you rate the pricing of our Sponsorship Avenues?
3. Did the level of exposure, recognition and value received at the event match your expectations?
4. How would you rate the effectiveness of the following deliverables? (wherever applicable)
i. Title Association
ii. Lecture Slot
iii. Stall
iv. Branding and Visibility at Shows
v. Branding and Visibility at one or more events
vi. On Ground Publicity: Banners, Standees and merchandise
vii. Banner and Profile on website
viii. Web-based Publicity: Facebook page, Blog
ix. Newspaper publications
5. How satisfied were you with your association with Shaastra?
Were you contacted well in advance
Was the lecture attended by the right audience
